decorative.description: Soft pink watercolor texture for page backgrounds (low opacity overlay)

layout.name: Layout
layout.instructions: Main wrapper with 'romantic_fade' background. Includes MusicPlayer and FloatingHearts background effect.

floating_hearts.name: FloatingHearts
floating_hearts.instructions: Background component using framer-motion to float heart SVGs upwards slowly. Opacity 0.2 to 0.5. Random sizes.

music_player.name: MusicPlayer
music_player.instructions: Fixed bottom-right. Round button with music icon. Plays soft romantic music loop. Auto-play if possible (handle browser restrictions by asking for interaction first).

runaway_button.name: RunawayButton
runaway_button.instructions: The 'NO' button. On hover/click, it calculates a new random position within the viewport (safe area) and animates to it instantly. Must NOT be clickable.

landing.name: ProposalPage
landing.instructions: Center aligned. Big 'Will you be my Valentine?' text. Two buttons: YES (Green/Pink, Pulse animation) and NO (RunawayButton). Clicking YES triggers confetti and navigates to /memories.

memories.name: MemoryLane
memories.instructions: Grid of flip cards. User must match pairs of photos. When a pair is matched, show a small caption (e.g., 'Our first date', 'Crazy times'). All pairs matched -> Show 'Next Level' button to /quiz.

quiz.name: LoveQuiz
quiz.instructions: 3-4 questions about their relationship (e.g., 'Where was our first date?', 'What is my favorite nickname for you?'). Correct answers show hearts. Wrong answers shake. All correct -> /reveal.

reveal.name: FinalReveal
reveal.instructions: The emotional climax. Hero image (Photo 5). A heartfelt letter scrolling up. 'Happy Valentine's Day Hippu!'. Background music swells. Button to 'Restart Journey'.

general: Use 'framer-motion' for all page transitions (fade in/out).
Ensure mobile responsiveness. The 'No' button logic must work on touch (move on touchstart).
Do not use pure black text. Use #4A0404 or #881337 for text.

accessibility.contrast: Ensure text on pink backgrounds has sufficient contrast (use dark red/brown).
